text:
I have a group of styles for my module and I want to apply them in a template.html. This should work right?

styles= { background_option= { full_width_background: “false” }
I believe background_option needs a : and not an =

<@UQWGKUEN7> So like this

styles= { background_option: { full_width_background:
false, background_color: “red” }
I think so - as far as I know only the top level group uses an = everything else is usually a colon

I’ve set it like this

styles= { background_option: { full_width_background:
false, background_color: “red” }}

but its not overwriting when building the template front-end
Are there any docs on this?
